res = pca_tg([[1.0,0.0],[0.0,1.0]], 2)
# convert to Python list and round each value
lst = res.numpy().tolist()
rounded = [[round(val,4) for val in row] for row in lst]
print(rounded)

res = pca_tg([[1.0,1.0],[2.0,2.0],[3.0,3.0]], 1)
# convert to Python list and round each value
lst = res.numpy().tolist()
rounded = [[round(val,4) for val in row] for row in lst]
print(rounded)
